column1: '''''Beleriand''''' is a song by the [[Tolkien metal]] band [[Summoning]]. It appears in their sixth full-lenght album
column2: [[Oath Bound]]. Its main theme is the arrival of [[Noldor]] in [[Beleriand]]
to north there lay the land of dread
in hills of shadow bleak and cold
to south the wide earth unexplored
to west the ancient ocean roared
to east in peaks of blue were piled

column1: The mountains of the outer world
To east in peaks of blue were piled
The mountains of the outer world
Thorn and thicket grove and glade
Whose brooding boughs with magic hung
Were ancient when the world was young
